methodology.description: For each promise, search for supporting laws (would help achieve promise) and contradicting laws (would hurt/prevent promise). AMPAY if >=60% NO on supporting OR >=60% SI on contradicting.

thresholds.ampay: >=60% NO on supporting laws OR >=60% SI on contradicting laws
thresholds.potential_ampay: >=40% NO on supporting OR >=40% SI on contradicting
